Address.college_name: University of National and World Economy
Address.university_name: Universitet za nacionalno i svetovno stopanstvo (UNWE)

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1920 as the Free University of Political and Economic Sciences established by Order No.2155 of July, 5th issued by the Minister of National Enlightment. Transformed into State Higher Institute of Finance and Administrative Sciences 1940 and reorganized as a Faculty of Economic and Social Studies at Sofia University 1947. Regained autonomy under the name Higher Institute of Economics 1952. Renamed after Karl Marx 1953. Reorganized as University of National and World Economy 1990. Acquired current status and title 1995. the eldest higher economic school in Bulgaria and Southeastern Europe

Founded 1888 as Higher School of Education with one Faculty, reorganized as University 1904 and acquired present title 1905 with the number of Faculties increasing to seven by 1938. Reorganized 1944, when the Faculties of Medicine and Agriculture were detached from the University and established as separate Institutions. Acquired present title and status 2004. A State Institution
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (diploma za zavarsheno sredno obrazovanie) and entrance examination
